scripts.build: cd wealth-pioneers-network && pnpm install && pnpm exec vite build && pnpm exec tsc -p tsconfig.server.json
scripts.build:prod: cd wealth-pioneers-network && pnpm install && pnpm exec vite build && pnpm exec tsc -p tsconfig.server.json
scripts.render:build: cd wealth-pioneers-network && pnpm install && pnpm run build && pnpm run server:build
